```{r}
make_choice <- function(N, split_number){
  sum <- 0
  times <- 1e5
  for(j in 1:times){
    input_list <- sample(1:N,N,replace = FALSE)
    criteria <- max(input_list[1:split_number])
    if(criteria==N){next}
    
    selection <- split_number+1

    for(i in (selection+1):N){
      if(input_list[i]>criteria){
        criteria <- input_list[i]
        break
      }
    }
    if(criteria==N ){sum <- sum+1}
  }

  p <- sum/times
}

res <- sapply(1:50, make_choice, N=100)
which.max(res)

```
